title: Ewer, 1686–1701
markings: Marks: On bottom, in underglaze blue: "AK / no 8" and raides from white ground "VIII". (Lunsing Scheurleer p. 373 DELFT, 1984).
provenance: John Lek, New York; Parke-Bernet Galleries, NY; John Lek Sale, Nov. 10, 1961; Phelps Warren 1961.
description: 8-sided, flattened, inverted pear-shaped body on raised foot, looped handle, slender neck, everted spout with leaf-shaped flanges at sides; painted in underglaze blue on white with dark outlines (trek) on body with dra-gons bordered by lambrequins, leaf border base, flowers neck, spots handle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Ewer, 1686–1701.
1686–1701. earthenware, tin glaze. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-45.
